[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/django-replace.svg?longCache=True)](https://pypi.org/project/django-replace/)

#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install django-replace
```

#### Examples
`template.html`
```html
{% load replace %}

{{ value|replace:",search,replace" }}
```
